description.english: Complete your first case
description.schinese: 完成你的第一宗案件
description.tchinese: 完成你的第一宗案件
description.german: Schließe deinen ersten Fall ab
description.french: Résolvez votre premier cas
description.spanish: Completa tu primer caso
description.russian: Завершите своё первое дело
description.japanese: 最初の事件を解決する
description.brazilian: Conclua seu primeiro caso

description.english: Guess the answer in 3 or fewer attempts
description.schinese: 在3次或更少的尝试中猜中答案
description.tchinese: 在3次或更少的嘗試中猜中答案
description.german: Errate die Lösung in 3 oder weniger Versuchen
description.french: Trouvez la réponse en 3 essais ou moins
description.spanish: Acierta la respuesta en 3 intentos o menos
description.russian: Угадайте ответ за 3 попытки или меньше
description.japanese: 3回以内の試行で答えを当てる
description.brazilian: Acerte a resposta em 3 tentativas ou menos

description.english: Win 10 games in a row without losing
description.schinese: 连赢10局而不败
description.tchinese: 連贏10局而不敗
description.german: Gewinne 10 Spiele in Folge ohne zu verlieren
description.french: Gagnez 10 parties d’affilée sans perdre
description.spanish: Gana 10 partidas seguidas sin perder
description.russian: Выиграйте 10 игр подряд без поражений
description.japanese: 10連勝を達成する
description.brazilian: Vença 10 jogos seguidos sem perder

description.english: Complete a timed 30-second challenge
description.schinese: 完成一次30秒限时挑战
description.tchinese: 完成一次30秒限時挑戰
description.german: Schließe eine zeitgesteuerte 30-Sekunden-Herausforderung ab
description.french: Terminez un défi chronométré de 30 secondes
description.spanish: Completa un desafío cronometrado de 30 segundos
description.russian: Выполните испытание на время за 30 секунд
description.japanese: 30秒制限のチャレンジをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua um desafio cronometrado de 30 segundos

description.english: Solve the puzzle on your very last attempt
description.schinese: 在最后一次机会中解开谜题
description.tchinese: 在最後一次機會中解開謎題
description.german: Löse das Rätsel bei deinem allerletzten Versuch
description.french: Résolvez l’énigme à votre tout dernier essai
description.spanish: Resuelve el rompecabezas en tu último intento
description.russian: Разгадайте головоломку на самой последней попытке
description.japanese: 最後の試行で謎を解く
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma na sua última tentativa

description.english: Solve a puzzle in Strict mode
description.schinese: 在严格模式下完成谜题
description.tchinese: 在嚴格模式下完成謎題
description.german: Löse ein Rätsel im strikten Modus
description.french: Résolvez une énigme en mode strict
description.spanish: Resuelve un rompecabezas en modo estricto
description.russian: Разгадайте головоломку в строгом режиме
description.japanese: 厳格モードで謎を解く
description.brazilian: Resolva um enigma no modo rigoroso

description.english: Have at least 3 correct letters in your first guess
description.schinese: 在第一次猜测中至少有3个字母正确
description.tchinese: 在第一次猜測中至少有3個字母正確
description.german: Habe mindestens 3 richtige Buchstaben bei deinem ersten Versuch
description.french: Ayez au moins 3 lettres correctes lors de votre première tentative
description.spanish: Consigue al menos 3 letras correctas en tu primer intento
description.russian: Получите как минимум 3 правильные буквы при первой попытке
description.japanese: 最初の試行で少なくとも3文字正解する
description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 3 letras corretas na sua primeira tentativa

description.english: First hit a correct letter position with only 2 or fewer attempts left, and win
description.schinese: 只剩2次或更少尝试时首次命中正确位置，并获胜
description.tchinese: 只剩2次或更少嘗試時首次命中正確位置，並獲勝
description.german: Triff erstmals eine richtige Buchstabenposition mit nur 2 oder weniger Versuchen übrig und gewinne
description.french: Trouvez une première lettre bien placée alors qu’il ne vous reste que 2 essais ou moins, et gagnez
description.koreana: 남은 시도가 2번 이하일 때 처음으로 글자 위치를 맞히고 승리하세요
description.spanish: Acierta la primera letra en la posición correcta con solo 2 intentos o menos restantes, y gana
description.russian: Впервые найдите букву на правильной позиции, имея 2 или меньше попыток, и выиграйте
description.japanese: 残り2回以下の試行で初めて文字の位置を当て、勝利する
description.brazilian: Acerte uma letra na posição correta com apenas 2 tentativas restantes ou menos, e vença

description.english: Win puzzles with 4, 5, 6, and 7 letters at least once each
description.schinese: 分别赢下4、5、6、7字母的谜题各一次
description.tchinese: 分別贏下4、5、6、7字母的謎題各一次
description.german: Gewinne Rätsel mit 4, 5, 6 und 7 Buchstaben jeweils mindestens einmal
description.french: Gagnez des énigmes avec 4, 5, 6 et 7 lettres au moins une fois chacune
description.koreana: 4, 5, 6, 7글자 퍼즐을 각각 한 번 이상 승리하세요
description.spanish: Gana rompecabezas de 4, 5, 6 y 7 letras al menos una vez cada uno
description.russian: Выиграйте головоломки с 4, 5, 6 и 7 буквами хотя бы по одному разу
description.japanese: 4、5、6、7文字の謎をそれぞれ一度ずつ解く
description.brazilian: Vença enigmas de 4, 5, 6 e 7 letras pelo menos uma vez cada

description.english: Complete your first Daily Challenge
description.schinese: 完成你的第一次每日挑战
description.tchinese: 完成你的第一次每日挑戰
description.german: Schließe deine erste tägliche Herausforderung ab
description.french: Terminez votre premier défi quotidien

description.russian: Выполните своё первое ежедневное испытание

description.english: Complete the Daily Challenge for 7 days in a row

description.english: Enter 3 invalid words in a single game
description.schinese: 在一局中输入3个无效单词
description.tchinese: 在一局中輸入3個無效單詞

description.brazilian: Digite 3 palavras inválidas em uma única partida

description.english: Permanently dismissed. Your investigation career ends here
description.schinese: 永久解雇，你的侦探生涯到此为止
description.tchinese: 永久解僱，你的偵探生涯到此為止
description.german: Dauerhaft entlassen. Deine Ermittlerkarriere endet hier
description.french: Révoqué définitivement. Votre carrière d’enquêteur s’arrête ici
description.koreana: 영구 해고. 당신의 수사 경력은 여기서 끝납니다
description.spanish: Despedido permanentemente. Tu carrera de investigador termina aquí
description.russian: Уволены навсегда. Ваша карьера следователя окончена
description.japanese: 永久解雇。探偵人生はここで終わる
description.brazilian: Permanentemente demitido. Sua carreira investigativa termina aqui

description.english: Case closed in haste, leaving more questions than answers
description.schinese: 匆忙结案，留下更多疑问
description.tchinese: 匆忙結案，留下更多疑問
description.german: Fall übereilt abgeschlossen, mehr Fragen als Antworten bleiben zurück
description.french: Affaire close à la hâte, laissant plus de questions que de réponses
description.koreana: 서둘러 사건을 종결해 더 많은 의문을 남기세요
description.spanish: Caso cerrado con prisa, dejando más preguntas que respuestas
description.russian: Дело закрыто в спешке, оставив больше вопросов, чем ответов
description.japanese: 急いで事件を終え、多くの疑問を残す
description.brazilian: Caso encerrado às pressas, deixando mais perguntas do que respostas

description.english: The key person has mysteriously disappeared
description.schinese: 关键人物神秘消失
description.tchinese: 關鍵人物神秘消失
description.german: Die Schlüsselfigur ist spurlos verschwunden
description.french: Le témoin clé a mystérieusement disparu
description.spanish: La persona clave ha desaparecido misteriosamente
description.russian: Ключевая персона бесследно исчезла
description.japanese: 重要人物が神秘的に消える
description.brazilian: A pessoa-chave desapareceu misteriosamente

description.english: Promoted and rewarded, but the truth is hidden
description.schinese: 得到升迁与奖励，但真相仍被掩盖
description.tchinese: 得到升遷與獎勵，但真相仍被掩蓋
description.german: Befördert und belohnt, doch die Wahrheit bleibt verborgen
description.french: Promu et récompensé, mais la vérité reste cachée
description.koreana: 승진과 보상을 받았지만 진실은 감춰져 있습니다
description.spanish: Ascendido y recompensado, pero la verdad permanece oculta
description.russian: Повышены и награждены, но правда скрыта
description.japanese: 昇進と報酬を得るが、真実は隠されたまま
description.brazilian: Promovido e recompensado, mas a verdade permanece oculta

description.english: The truth revealed. The voice behind it all was him
description.schinese: 真相揭晓，幕后之声正是他
description.tchinese: 真相揭曉，幕後之聲正是他
description.german: Die Wahrheit kommt ans Licht. Hinter allem steckte seine Stimme
description.french: La vérité révélée. La voix derrière tout cela, c’était lui
description.koreana: 진실이 밝혀졌다. 모든 것의 배후의 목소리는 그였다
description.spanish: La verdad revelada. La voz detrás de todo era él
description.russian: Истина раскрыта. Голос за всем этим был его
description.japanese: 真実が明らかに。全ての背後にいた声は彼だった
description.brazilian: A verdade revelada. A voz por trás de tudo era ele
